analysis.description:
RefundableCrowdsale.forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#418-426) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(amountWei) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#421-422)

ESportsFreezingStorage.release (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#92-111) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount == 0

Reentrancy in FinalizableCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#373-382):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(hasEnded()) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#379-380)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#380-381)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#256-309) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#302)

ESportsMainCrowdsale.postBuyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#506-516) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bonusProvider.addDelayedBonus(_beneficiary,soldTokens,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#512-514)

ESportsMainCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#598-604) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#599-601)

ESportsMainCrowdsale.mintToFounders (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#547-572) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ertToken.mintTimelocked(TEAM_BEN_ADDRESS,TEAM_BEN_TOKENS.mul(20).div(100),startTime + 220752000) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#548-549)
	-ertToken.mintTimelocked(TEAM_BEN_ADDRESS,TEAM_BEN_TOKENS.mul(30).div(100),startTime + 662256000) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#549-550)
	-ertToken.mintTimelocked(TEAM_BEN_ADDRESS,TEAM_BEN_TOKENS.mul(30).div(100),startTime + 1103760000) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#550-554)
	-ertToken.mintTimelocked(TEAM_PHIL_ADDRESS,TEAM_PHIL_TOKENS.mul(20).div(100),startTime + 220752000) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#556-559)
	-ertToken.mintTimelocked(TEAM_PHIL_ADDRESS,TEAM_PHIL_TOKENS.mul(30).div(100),startTime + 662256000) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#559-565)
	-ertToken.mintTimelocked(TEAM_PHIL_ADDRESS,TEAM_PHIL_TOKENS.mul(30).div(100),startTime + 1103760000) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#566-568)

ESportsToken.returnFrozenFreeFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- amount = frozenStorages[x].release(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#256-309):
	External calls:
	- totalSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#261-262)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- soldTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#298-302)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/9/0x723aaf922709819c25344b81901dd8a9c84c0b89.sol#296-298)
